Posts.Content: Hi  I am just coming up to my first anniversary of my mastectomy.  Everything seems to be going fine.  I is just me I can feel fine on minute and the next everything is too much.  Is this normal?
Posts.Title: Feeling sad

Posts.Content: Hi Sharon I cannot agree with you more.  I have never done anything like this before but the responses that I have received have all been so positive.  Feeling a bit better today  Bobbie
Posts.Title: Feeling sad
